name: add-action-type
description: Add a new action type to the decision system
instructions: 1. Add the action type to ActionType union in packages/ui/src/lib/types.ts
2. Add the action icon mapping in IncidentTimeline.tsx and IncidentDetail.tsx
3. Add execution logic in decision-flow.yaml Switch cases
4. Add to safety constraints in Oumi configs if needed
5. Create sample training data for the new action
